mng: and, as well as, and so, but (not), yet (not), (indicates causal relation), (indicates change of state), (indicates contrast)

exm.mng: (not only ...) but also, moreover, in addition, furthermore
instead, on the contrary, contrary (to expectations)
therefore, as a result, thus, and as a result, ...
clearly and easy to see (idiom); obviously, clearly, it goes without saying
